fields.name: title
fields.description: title of the periodical; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_url
fields.description: link to work record in Trove; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_type
fields.description: Trove work format, eg: 'Book'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: type
fields.description: eg: 'text'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: format
fields.description: eg: 'volume'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: extent
fields.description: size or physical dimensions; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: language
fields.description: publication language; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: subject
fields.description: associated subject headings; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: is_part_of
fields.description: collections or series this publication is part of; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: library identifiers; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: rights
fields.description: copyright and licensing information; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: fulltext_url_text
fields.description: text of link to digitised book viewer

fields.name: catalogue_url
fields.description: link to NLA catalogue; multiple values separated by | symbol
